descript.abstract: This lookup table records the valid algorithms for aggregating soil property values or soil interpretation results to the map unit level.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: A narrative description of an aggregation method.
The name of a method by which a soil property or interpretation may be aggregated. In some table contexts, the default aggregation method for the corresponding soil attribute.
Initials that identify an aggregation method.
An integer number used to order the list of valid aggregation methods.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
